name: Logs and Fire - soft sculpture
description:
Logs and Fire 

Warm your hands with a soft sculpture of a small campfire made by New York artist Amanda Browder. These Logs and Fire are made by hand and are equally unique. 

Made with faux fur, poly fil and felt. These pieces have been shown in galleries around the world and are now being made as a multiple for this pop-art-shop! 

 $300: Price includes 2 logs and one fire. 

If you buy a collection it becomes a BONFIRE! 

Warm your home with love and warmth with this unique soft piece.
